Package org.ow2.chameleon.metric

Interface Summary
SystemOfUnits A system of units is a set of units which are chosen as the reference scales for some set of quantity kinds together with the definitions of each unit.
 

Class Summary
DefaultSystemOfUnits Default implementation of a system of units.
DerivedUnit<Q extends Quantity<Q>> Derived units are units expressed as product of base units.
DerivedUnitBuilder<Q extends Quantity<Q>> Builder to create derived units.
Dimension This class defines international dimension with there normalized symbol.
DimensionBuilder Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
DimensionProduct This class provides methods to build product of differents dimensions.
MetricService The entry point of the metric-service system.
Prefix Represents a prefix.
PrefixedUnit<Q extends Quantity<Q>> Represent an unit prefixed by a `prefix`.
Quantity<Q extends Quantity<Q>> This class defines what is a quantity.
TransformedUnit<Q extends Quantity<Q>> This class allows to build transform units.
TransformedUnitBuilder<Q extends Quantity<Q>> This class is the builder of transformedUnit class.
Unit<Q extends Quantity<Q>> This class defines a unit.
UnitProduct This class provides methods to build product of units.
 

Exception Summary
IncommensurableException See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commensurability_(philosophy_of_science).
